biotools.summary:
MicrobeTrace is a web-based tool to visually render networks from surveillance, epidemiologic
investigations, and genetic analyses. Using simple point-and-click interfaces, data can
be readily imported, integrated and visualized...no coding required!

bioschemas.name: MicrobeTrace
